alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 10:05AM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Water is partially covering several county roads and dirt roads near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Monday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue rising to 23.0 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 18.3 Mon 8 am CDT 18.7 20.8 22.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
